title: Dancing with Rachael

[[include info:start]]

[[include :kaktuskontainer:more-by-darkstuff]]

[[include info:end]]

[[=]]
//In between each tiny thing,//
//Cracked in rock or dreamed in dreams,//
//Lies a piece of a mystery,//
//Its secrets//

//In each spark of lightning,//
//Drawn on walls, in sewing seams,//
//Lies something we barely see,//
//Its secrets//

//Lean in close, lend an ear,//
//Do not fuss, forget the years,//
//Everything will be explained//
//And all in good time//
//What secrets kept from you//
//Inside your own mind?//

@@@@
@@@@
